title: Beautiful 4BR Home with Parking + Deck
description:
For rent on short-term ($7500/month) or long-term basis ($6500/month), four bedroom townhouse in Queen Village with dedicated parking and roof deck.
We are looking for short-term tenants for our spacious furnished family home with large roof deck and dedicated parking in Queen Village.  The home has four bedrooms (one currently set up as an office), 2.5 baths and finished basement.  The roof deck is new and shows spectacular views of the sunrise, sunset and beautiful full moons rising over the Delaware River.
More details:
- Enter the home through a foyer with hall closet and half bath, living and dining to your left (with bar sink) and kitchen to your right featuring granite counters, glass tile back-splash, Stainless Steel Subzero refrigerator, built-in shelving and six burner oven.
- 2nd floor offers 2 bedrooms w/ an open double closet in each plus and Juliet balconies. Hall w/ laundry rm & full bath.
- 3rd floor includes 2 bedrooms, spa-like bath w/ over-sized brick tile stall shower w/ rain shower-head and vanity w/ wood bowl sink. Front bedroom with steps to brand new roof and fantastic ipe rooftop deck.
- Finally head down to the finished lower level family room featuring a wall of built-in closets/shelving and don't miss the one-of-a-kind floor to ceiling wine rack.
- Beautiful hardwood floors throughout, brand new custom polished steel stair railings, designer lighting including entry glass chandelier, Mitchell Gold kitchen lighting and contemporary Legrand Adorne switches.
- The house has 3 balconies, 1 landscaped gated side patio and a huge newly rebuilt 37' amazing roofdeck w/ 360 degree skyline views.  Furnishings include a queen bed, king bed, twin bed, crib, kitchen table and chairs, living and dining room furniture, pull out sofa / TV / treadmill in basement, couch in BR4/den, desk and simple deck furniture.
- Property resides in the coveted Meredith School District and has new Anderson windows & sliding glass doors throughout.
Walk to award-winning restaurants, movie theaters, coffee shops, Whole Foods within walking distance and more!   Deeded Pkg Spot is the first parking space on the right in the courtyard directly adjacent to the side yard.
No pets or smoking allowed. Tenant to pay $350 cleaning (happy to credit some back if place is left clean!) + utilities (usually about $350).  Please get in touch to discuss your desired length of lease.
Thank you!

title: Cedar Park house with garden & porch on quiet street
description:
Beautiful four-bedroom house on the quietest block of Osage Avenue. The house features a south-facing front porch (great in all seasons!), large living room, open kitchen & dining area, back “shed-room” for extra storage, powder room, front yard and large backyard with perennial plantings. Upstairs is a sunny front bedroom with an enormous closet and bay window, large rear bedroom, comfortable middle bedroom and a cozy fourth bedroom, perfect for a nursery or office. Everything has been recently restored – modern windows throughout, updated furnace & water heater – while keeping original historic woodwork and stained glass intact. Dry basement with built-in storage shelving and washer and dryer. 1700 square feet in total.
The block is a wonderful place to live – with terrific neighbors, block club, CSA pick-up next door, and a quiet one-way street that ends on Malcolm X Park. It’s within walking distance of all types of public transit (subway, bus, trolley), the Baltimore Ave. shopping corridor, and numerous parks and playgrounds.
We love this house and are hoping to find tenants who will love it and its gardens as much as we do. Available September 4, 2022 for lease ending May 31, 2023 or extending longer (no short term leases). Rent is $2200 per month. Tenant pays utilities, including gas heat, electric and water.

title: " Open house 6/5 1-2 pm " In the heart of Wilmington,
description: Absolutely charming ranch in the heart of Pike Creek! Welcome to 2504 St. James Church Road in the Village of Lindell: move-in ready and perfect for first time home-rental or down sizers! Enter the main living area through an attractive leaded glass door. With neutral carpet and great natural light, this room flows into the kitchen/dining area. The spacious kitchen is equipped with a Samsung French stainless refrigerator, a ceramic five-burner cooktop, a Kenmore wall oven, and a Kenmore SS microwave. The dual stainless sink is offset by attractively refurbished formica countertops and backsplash. The kitchen hosts plentiful cabinet and storage space!  Adjacent is a dining area, spacious enough for a large table and chairs. Just beyond is a family room, fully carpeted, with a lighted ceiling fan and plentiful windows. Toward the front of the house is the utility/laundry room with more cupboard space, counters for folding laundry, and a GE high-efficiency front loading washer and dryer, as well as a utility sink. Beyond the kitchen, through sliders, is the heart of the home: a four-season addition with baseboard heat and a ceiling fan. With indoor/outdoor carpet and direct access to the private backyard, this space could be used as a playroom, porch, or whatever your heart desires. There are three bedrooms, all carpeted, with plentiful windows. The largest bedroom hosts 2 double closets, One large bathroom includes tiled floors, an enormous linen closet, and shower. The rear yard is a peaceful oasis and has a  fully-fenced with a decorative 6’ vinyl privacy fence, and has TWO oversized sheds, providing additional storage. Super clean and bright, this home is awaiting new rental. Offered with a newer (2019) Bradford White hot water heater, this home is heated with an electric heat pump, and has many upgrades within the past few years.  County records for the square footage may not accurately reflect the rear edition which is permitted.

title: $950.00 incl heat - Private Entry
description:
Centrally located at 147 East Lancaster Ave and Armor Alley Pocket Park/Walkway directly located across Lancaster Ave from the huge Municipal parking lot.  East Branch Brewery and Estrella are across Lancaster Ave in the once "Alert Fire House" building.  Georgio's Restaurant/Deli/Ice Cream is next door as is McDonalds.
The apartment is a quiet, peaceful spot away from traffic.  Entry to the second floor apartment is a private entry staircase off of Armor Alley Walkway.  The Walkway leads from Lancaster Ave to Mill Road and on to the Milltown Market Complex with Planet Fitness, Kimberton Whole Foods and more.. Kerr Park and Streuble Trail are a short walk of jog.
Convenient to major highways:  Route 113 to Phoenixville, Rt 30 East to Rt 202, Rt 30 West to Lancaster County.
Rt 322 West to Honey Brook and Ephrata.  Train Station is one mile West.
Nice size rooms: The apartment space offers a nice size Livingroom, Updated Kitchen with Magic Chef refrigerator and Hotpoint Electric stove with walk-thru Dinette area to Bedroom and Bathroom w/ Shower..and exit to rear staircase.
TERMS:  Rent is $950.00 per month incl Heat, hot/cold Water, Sewer, Trash Removal at Dumpster. Rent is due on the first day of each month to be paid on the premises.
LEASE: 12-month term converts to month-to-month after one year with 30-day notice to move.
Security Deposit is $950.00 at time of lease signing along with first month's rent. Mid-month rental would be pro-rated.
Application with personal and credit references required.
Make contact for a walk-thru appointment with your available days and time of day.
CURRENTLY READY FOR OCCUPANCY.
The apartment space is clean with new paint throughout with nicely carpeted Livingroom and Bedroom.  Windows overlook the gardens of Armor Alley Pocket Park/Walkway.
A QUIET professional occupied building personally managed by life-time owner.
Showings by appointments Exterior door photo is prior to the redesign of Armor Alley Walkway.  Currently, the
prep work is completed on the building ready for new paint in the coming months.
